entry.title: btrfs and bohdi linux
entry.content:
btrfs and Bohdi linux

So looking into docker and dockerlite for lightweight virtualisation – aka LXCs (Ubuntu LXC documentation). Docker is programmed in go and not knowing anything about go saw dockerlite uses bash scripts and btrfs- Looking at btrfs it allows sub-volumes as well as a lot of other nifty features. Therefore thought I would install on my bohdi linux VM which had an ext4 disk. I used an ubuntu live CD and followed these conversion from ext to btrfs instructions.

Seems to have worked well.
